problem_text_cn: 如图,身高为1.6m的某学生想测量一棵大树的高度,她沿着树影BA由B到A走去,当走到C点时,她的影子顶端正好与树的影子顶端重合,测得BC=3.2m,CA=0.8m,则树的高度为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, a student with a height of N_0 wants to measure the height of a big tree. She walks along the tree shadow BA from B to A. When reaching point C, the top of her shadow coincides with the top of the tree's shadow. Measured BC = N_1, CA = N_2, then the height of the tree is ()
raw_answer:
解:因为人和树均垂直于地面,所以和光线构成的两个直角三角形相似,
设树高x米,则\frac{AC}{AB}=\frac{1.6}{x},
即\frac{0.8}{0.8+3.2}=\frac{1.6}{x}∴x=8
故选:C．
